Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 11:40:50
Folder: CJKJ9B4 - opportunity to receive a personalized risk report
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CJKJ9B4_00
From: Mohammad Galadari <mohammad.galadari@aon.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-05-05 12:41
Subject: Opportunity to receive a personalized risk report
--------------------------------------------------
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن


Hi Hagop

 

You may have already received invite from Aon, but I wanted to send a note to make sure you don’t miss the chance to participate in our Global Risk Management Survey.

 

It’s a 10-minute survey designed to assess attitudes towards risk and risk management that we run every two years. If you complete it, you can request a personalised benchmarking report that shows how your answers compare with industry benchmarks so it can be a good way to identify new or underestimated risks.

 

If you want to take part, here’s the link <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/XMiyCA90kIn4Vo1tGfkfGWrr9?domain=sg.aon.nl> . It’s open until May 30.

 

I’d be happy to go over the results with you once they’re out later this year.

 

If you have any questions let me know.

 

Kind regards,

Mohammad Galadari
